title: of X phrase orphans
description:
~19 lines start with 'of' followed by a noun: 'of a lemon', 'of a medium onion', 'of a red or white onion'. These are fragments from phrases like 'juice of a lemon' or 'zest of a medium onion' where the first part got separated upstream.

See doc/ingredient-parsing.md for workflow and file locations.
